headline: BXP Announces Strategic Dispositions Totaling More than $1.0 Billion
summary: BOSTON, January 14, 2026--BXP (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that it has completed property sales with aggregate net proceeds of more than $1.0 billion, marking significant progress toward the 2025 through 2027 strategic asset sales plan outlined at BXPâ€™s Investor Day in September 2025.
